text: Dark skinny guy cashier has a really bad attitude. He accepted payment by visa for a guy buying cigarettes after 930pm. But when I wanted to buy isotonic drinks that cost more than $10 after the cigarettes buyer, he told me the shop only accepts cash after 930pm. I asked him why the inconsistency. Then he showed me a black face and process the payment.

The cashier of this shop super rude if you buy 2x or 3x they think we collect plastic bag..in a first place aunte cashier first pay more than $80 we never ask plastic. 2nd pay 3bot of drinks you give the plastic 3rd pay for snacks she whispered to the other cashier so.. thats why the other aunte say no more plastic. Coz the other cashier think we collect plastic..if we collect plastic the $80 of drinks better i ask plastic..i feel embarrased..to the other customer.. so easy to judge the people auntie cashier respect your customers..and we regular buy this shop i feel all the cashier this shop no friendly..

The admin staff at the cashier counter is very rude. Bad shopping experience for two times. I think is the same lady around 60 yr. First time is because there was a long queue waiting to be paid, an uncle just cut my queue, the cashier lady look at us and knows what happened, I thought she will ask me to pay first, but she ask the uncle who cut mg queue to pay without any apologize. The second time is when I am payinv for my things, I got attracted by the slime (toy) placed at the counter, I took about five seconds to choose which color I want, and then she shouted at me with a very fierce tone "are you done?!". I am shocked why she is so rush as there is no one queuing after me and I just took five seconds only. Horrible shopping experiences
